I installed this not a porblem on install. Cracked it not a porblem on activation. Ran updates on Symantec not problem on updates. Ok the security center does not recognize Symantec. Windows update didn't like the Office Enterprise  key. I thought no big deal uninstall office and Symantec. I attmpted to uninstall office with the plan of reinstalling my own copy. 90% way through the unistall the MSI crashes saying language not supported. I couldnt not run the unistaller again. I reinstalled by key and office Enterprise over it. Nothing but errors and crashes in Outlook. Ok I am thinking uninstall Symantec and reboot. Look at office after. Not so easy. Network protocols were hung after uninstall of office and reboot. Could not even recieve an IP address from DHCP. I entered an IP add manually. Still would not register with DNS. OK....so I gave up and reformatted. Installed an untouched ISO that did not have any preinstalled programs slipped streamed in. Few, activated it...installed my office, Defrag, AV yada yada...runs nice. NOW.
